description.zh: 全球最大的开源机器学习数据集平台，托管超过100,000个数据集，涵盖NLP、计算机视觉、音频、多模态等领域
description.en: The world's largest open-source ML dataset platform, hosting 100,000+ datasets covering NLP, computer vision, audio, and multimodal domains

authority_justification.zh: Hugging Face 是 AI/ML 社区的事实标准平台，获得超过 $400M 融资，与 Google、Amazon、Microsoft 等合作
authority_justification.en: Hugging Face is the de facto standard platform for AI/ML community, raised $400M+, partnered with Google, Amazon, Microsoft

access_method.python: pip install datasets; from datasets import load_dataset
